<div class="asset-content subscriber-premium" itemprop="articleBody">
<div class="subscriber-preview"><p>A boil notice has been lifted for Bluebonnet Rural Water Corp. customers.</p>
</div><div class="subscriber-preview"><p>BRWC had notified customers in northeast Washington County that they should boil water or use bottled water after the system lost pressure last week.</p>
</div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>The boil notice was in effect until BRWC received notification that samples had passed water quality tests.</p>
</div>
<div data-tnt-ads-tmp='{"vendor":"blox","type":"region","region":"fixed-big-ad-top-asset","id":"fixed-big-ad-top-asset","pos":"fixed-big-ad-top-asset, atf","fold":"above","include_domain":null,"size":"[300,250]","height":"250","width":"300","mobile":false,"js":{"video":"https:\/\/bloximages.chicago2.vip.townnews.com\/brenhambanner.com\/shared-content\/art\/tncms\/templates\/libraries\/flex\/components\/video\/resources\/scripts\/video.512a6903eae08e033c76afdce2a0eac7.js"},"overline":null,"index_slug":null,"url":"\/news"}' style="display:none;"></div>
<div data-refreshable="true" data-region="fixed-big-ad-top-asset"><div class="tncms-region-ads" id="tncms-region-ads-fixed-big-ad-top-asset">
<div id="blox-ad-position-fixed-big-ad-top-asset1">
<script type="text/javascript">TNCMS.AdManager.render({region: 'fixed-big-ad-top-asset', slot: 1, fold: "above"});</script>
</div>
</div>
</div><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_top"></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>“We greatly appreciate our customers’ patience during the last week while we worked to restore water pressure,” said Matt Bentke, chief operating officer for Bluebonnet Electric Cooperative, which owns BRWC. “We will continue to closely monitor our water system so we can provide reliable service to our customers.”</p>
</div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>About 350 customers were affected by the loss in water pressure — those served by he water utility’s No. 1 plant site on Lone Star Road. Water pressure was lost Friday, July 29, and problems persisted for several more days.</p>
</div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>Several leaks were repaired, but after a water tank that services the area was refilled, pressure was lost again.</p>
</div>
<div data-tnt-ads-tmp='{"vendor":"blox","type":"region","region":"fixed-big-ad-middle-asset","id":"fixed-big-ad-middle-asset","pos":"fixed-big-ad-middle-asset, stf","fold":"span","include_domain":null,"size":"[300,250]","height":"250","width":"300","mobile":false,"js":{"video":"https:\/\/bloximages.chicago2.vip.townnews.com\/brenhambanner.com\/shared-content\/art\/tncms\/templates\/libraries\/flex\/components\/video\/resources\/scripts\/video.512a6903eae08e033c76afdce2a0eac7.js"},"overline":null,"index_slug":null,"url":"\/news"}' style="display:none;"></div>
<div data-refreshable="true" data-region="fixed-big-ad-middle-asset">
</div><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_middle"></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>Service was restored last Tuesday to all but about 50 customers, and those were brought back online a few days later.</p>
</div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>Samples must be tested by the Texas Commission on Environmental Quality.</p>
</div>
<div data-tnt-ads-tmp='{"vendor":"blox","type":"region","region":"fixed-big-ad-bottom-asset","id":"fixed-big-ad-bottom-asset","pos":"fixed-big-ad-bottom-asset, btf","fold":"below","include_domain":null,"size":"[300,250]","height":"250","width":"300","mobile":false,"js":{"video":"https:\/\/bloximages.chicago2.vip.townnews.com\/brenhambanner.com\/shared-content\/art\/tncms\/templates\/libraries\/flex\/components\/video\/resources\/scripts\/video.512a6903eae08e033c76afdce2a0eac7.js"},"overline":null,"index_slug":null,"url":"\/news"}' style="display:none;"></div>

</div><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_bottom"></div>
</div>

<script src="https://bloximages.chicago2.vip.townnews.com/brenhambanner.com/shared-content/art/tncms/templates/libraries/flex/components/plugins/resources/scripts/jquery.calendario.7b513d925fce875220017f8d5a8055a0.js"></script>
<script>/*<![CDATA[*/ jQuery(document).ready(function($){
        var aChecked = [],
            urlParams = '/search/?l=25&unrolled=1&s=start_time&sd=asc&f=html',

            $wrapper = $( '#block-1435464 .fc-inner' ),
            $calendar = $( '#calendar-1435464' ),
            cal = $calendar.calendario({
                displayWeekAbbr: true,
                startIn: 0,
                onDayClick: function( $el, $contentEl, dateProperties ) {
                    window.location = $('#block-1435464 .url-template').attr('href') + urlParams + '&d1=' + $el.find('.fc-date').data('date') + '&d2=' + $el.find('.fc-date').data('date');
                }
            }),
            $month = $( '#block-1435464 .fc-month' ).html( cal.getMonthName() ),
            $year = $( '#block-1435464 .fc-year' ).html( cal.getYear() );


        $('#block-1435464 .fc-next').on('click', function() {
            cal.gotoNextMonth(updateMonthYear);
        });
        $('#block-1435464 .fc-prev').on('click', function() {
            cal.gotoPreviousMonth(updateMonthYear);
        });
        function updateMonthYear(){
            $month.html(cal.getMonthName());
            $year.html(cal.getYear());
            fetchDays();
        }
        function fetchDays(){
            if( aChecked.indexOf(cal.getYear() + '-' + cal.getMonth()) == -1 ){
                $.ajax({
                    type: 'GET',
                    dataType: 'json',
                    url: $('#block-1435464 .url-template').attr('href') + '/search/?year='+cal.getYear()+'&month='+cal.getMonth()+'&fmt=json',
                    cache: true,
                    success: function(data) {
                        $.each(data, function(index, value){
                            if(value.result.numEvents > 0){
                                sMonth = value.result.month.toString();
                                if(sMonth.length < 2){ sMonth = '0'+sMonth }
                                sDay = value.result.day.toString();
                                if(sDay.length < 2){ sDay = '0'+sDay }
                                sString = sMonth + '-' + sDay + '-' + value.result.year;

                                oNumEvents = {};

                                var iOneDot = 1,
                                    iTwoDots = 2,
                                    iThreeDots = 3;

                                oNumEvents[sString] = '<div class="fc-data-item">';
                                if( value.result.numEvents > 0 && value.result.numEvents < iOneDot+1 ){
                                    oNumEvents[sString] += '<i class="fa fa-circle"></i> ';
                                }else if( value.result.numEvents > iOneDot && value.result.numEvents < iTwoDots+1 ){
                                    oNumEvents[sString] += '<i class="fa fa-circle"></i> <i class="fa fa-circle"></i>';
                                }else if( value.result.numEvents > iTwoDots ){
                                    oNumEvents[sString] += '<i class="fa fa-circle"></i> <i class="fa fa-circle"></i> <i class="fa fa-circle"></i>';
                                }
                                oNumEvents[sString] += '</div>';

                                cal.setData(oNumEvents);
                            }
                        });

                        if( aChecked.indexOf(cal.getYear() + '-' + cal.getMonth()) == -1 ){
                            aChecked.push(cal.getYear() + '-' + cal.getMonth());
                        }
                    },
                    error: function(response) {
                        __tnt.log(response.status);
                    }
                });
            }
        }
        fetchDays();
    }); /*]]>*/</script>

<div class="ndn-container p402_hide">
<div class="ndn_embed" data-config-distributor-id="90319" data-config-height="9/16w" data-config-width="100%" id="ndn-video-player-1"></div>
<script type="text/javascript">var _ndnq = _ndnq || []; _ndnq.push(['embed']);</script>
</div>
<style>#ndn-video-player-2.ndn_embedded .ndn_floatContainer { margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 20px; }</style>
<div class="ndn-container p402_hide">
<div class="ndn_embed" data-config-distributor-id="90319" data-config-height="9/16w" data-config-width="100%" id="ndn-video-player-2"></div>
<script type="text/javascript">var _ndnq = _ndnq || []; _ndnq.push(['embed']);</script>
</div>
<p><span>NITRO, W.Va. -- A boil water advisory has been issued after two apparent water main breaks in Nitro and Cross Lanes.</span><span>Krista Farley with the Kanawha-Charleston Health Department said any residence or business in the Nitro/Cross Lanes area that has lost water, has low water pressure or cloudy water should operate under the advisory until further notice.</span><span>Before use, people should boil their water for at least one full minute.</span> <span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman'">Businesses in the Nitro Marketplace have been affected, Farley said. </span></p><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_bottom"><div class="tncms-block" id="tncms-block-608361">
<div class="tnt-ads-container text-center ">
<div class="tnt-ads dfp-ad" data-refreshable="true" id="ad-608361" style="min-height:250px; min-width:300px;">
<script>
                googletag.cmd.push(function() {
                    googletag.display('ad-608361');
                    
                });
            </script>
</div>
</div>

<p><span>NITRO, W.Va. -- A boil water advisory has been issued after two apparent water main breaks in Nitro and Cross Lanes.</span><span>Krista Farley with the Kanawha-Charleston Health Department said any residence or business in the Nitro/Cross Lanes area that has lost water, has low water pressure or cloudy water should operate under the advisory until further notice.</span><span>Before use, people should boil their water for at least one full minute.</span> <span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman'">Businesses in the Nitro Marketplace have been affected, Farley said. </span></p><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_bottom"><div class="tncms-block" id="tncms-block-608361">

        jQuery(document).ready(function($){
            var bThrottle = false;

            if (
                $region.is(':empty') === false &&
                $('.main-sidebar').height() + $(window).height() < $('.main-content').height() &&

            ) {
                var $tempRegion = $('<div id="sticky-right-rail-placeholder"></div>');

                    if( bThrottle === false ){
                        bThrottle = true;

                        setTimeout(function(){
                            var iFixPoint = $region.offset().top - 80;
                            var iCurPoint = $(this).scrollTop();

                            if (iCurPoint < $tempRegion.offset().top - 80) {
                                $region.css('top', null);
                                $region.removeClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');

                            } else if (
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#infinite-container') ||

                            ) {

                            } else {
                                $region.css('top', 80);
                                $region.addClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');
                            }
                            bThrottle = false;
                        }, 25);
                    }
                });

                $(window).on('resize', function(){
                    $region.width( $tempRegion.width() );
                });

        });
